Catalog.Name: SDSS_DR1
Catalog.Description: This is an AstroGrid Dataset Access installation of the Sloan Digital Sky Survey Data Release 3 (SDSS DR3) hosted by the Wide Field Astronomy Unit (WFAU), University of Edinburgh. WFAU would like to thank John Hopkins University and the University of Chicago for permission to host the data.

Table.Name: SpecObjAll
Table.Description: Contains the measured parameters for a spectrum

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x of Normal unit vector in J2000

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y of Normal unit vector in J2000

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z of Normal unit vector in J2000

Column.Name: primTarget
Column.Description: Specifies which primary target catagories the object was selected in.

Column.Name: secTarget
Column.Description: Specifies which secondary target catagories the object was selected in.

Column.Name: sciencePrimary
Column.Description: Deemed to be science-worthy (defines default view SpecObj)

Column.Name: plateID
Column.Description: Link to plate on which the spectrum was taken

Column.Name: throughput
Column.Description: fiber throughput as measured by mapper

Table.Name: TilingInfo
Table.Description: Contain info on what happened to a TargetObj in a run of tiling software

Column.Name: tid
Column.Description: unique ID of object within tiling run

Column.Name: tile
Column.Description: Tile the object was assigned (-1 if not assigned to a tile)

Column.Name: tiMask
Column.Description: mask bits to determine what happened during tiling

Column.Name: collisionGroupID
Column.Description: unique ID of collisionGroup in this tiling run

Table.Name: StripeDefs
Table.Description: This table contains the definitions of the survey layout as planne

Column.Name: eta
Column.Description: Survey eta for the center of stripe

Column.Name: lambdaMin
Column.Description: Survey lambda lower limit of the stripe

Column.Name: lambdaMax
Column.Description: Survey lambda upper limit of the stripe

Table.Name: HoleObj
Table.Description: Information for holes on a Plat

Table.Name: Neighbors
Table.Description: All PhotoObj pairs within 0.5 arcmin

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: The unique objId of the center object

Column.Name: mode
Column.Description: object is primary, secondary, family, outside

Column.Name: neighborMode
Column.Description: is neighbor primary, secondary, family, outside

Table.Name: SDSSConstants
Table.Description: This table contains most relevant survey constants and their physical unit

Table.Name: PhotoTag
Table.Description: Contains a popular fields of PhotoObj tabl

Column.Name: obj
Column.Description: The object id within a field. Usually changes between reruns of the same field.

Column.Name: nChild
Column.Description: Number of children if this is a composite object that has been deblended. BRIGHT (in a flags sense) objects also have nchild == 1, the non-BRIGHT sibling.

Column.Name: type
Column.Description: Morphological type classification of the object.

Column.Name: probPSF
Column.Description: Probability that the object is a star. Currently 0 if type == 3 (galaxy), 1 if type == 6 (star).

Column.Name: insideMask
Column.Description: Flag to indicate whether object is inside a mask and why

Column.Name: modelMagErr_u
Column.Description: better of DeV/Exp magnitude fit error

Column.Name: modelMagErr_g
Column.Description: better of DeV/Exp magnitude fit error

Column.Name: modelMagErr_r
Column.Description: better of DeV/Exp magnitude fit error

Column.Name: modelMagErr_i
Column.Description: better of DeV/Exp magnitude fit error

Column.Name: modelMagErr_z
Column.Description: better of DeV/Exp magnitude fit error

Column.Name: status
Column.Description: Status of the object in the survey

Column.Name: primTarget
Column.Description: Bit mask of primary target categories the object was selected in.

Column.Name: secTarget
Column.Description: Bit mask of secondary target categories the object was selected in.

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: 20-deep hierarchical trangular mesh ID of this object

Column.Name: fieldID
Column.Description: Link to the field this object is in

Column.Name: SpecObjID
Column.Description: Pointer to the spectrum of object, if exists, else 0

Table.Name: ObjMask
Table.Description: Contains a record describing each ObjMask/Atlas objec

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique Id number, composed of rerun, run, camcol, field, objid

Table.Name: RunShift
Table.Description: The table contains values of the various manual nu shifts for run

Table.Name: QsoConcordance
Table.Description: A concordance of all the objects from Spectro, Best, or Target that 'smell' like a QS

Column.Name: RowC_i
Column.Description: i band Row center position (r' coordinates)

Column.Name: ColC_i
Column.Description: i band Column center position (r' coordinates)

Column.Name: bestObjID
Column.Description: Unique SDSS identifier in Best DB composed from [rerun,run,camcol,field,obj], or 0 if there is none.

Column.Name: targetObjID
Column.Description: Unique SDSS identifier in Target DB composed from [rerun,run,camcol,field,obj], or 0 if there is none.

Column.Name: zone
Column.Description: 1 arcminute zone used for spatial joins floor((dec+90)*60*60)

Column.Name: QsoConfidence
Column.Description: a number between 0..1. If this has a SpecObj, then it is the QSO Zconf (see table definition). If no specobj, it is .3*(BestObjFlagedQso+TargetObjFlagedQso)

Column.Name: SpecObjFlagedQso
Column.Description: Flag (0 / 1): 1 means this SpecObj is SpecClass QSO or HiX_QSO

Column.Name: BestObjFlagedQso
Column.Description: Flag (0 / 1): 1 PhotoObjID was flagged as a QSO in the target flags.

Column.Name: TargetObjFlagedQso
Column.Description: Flag (0 / 1): 1 PhotoObjID was flagged as a QSO in the target flags.

Column.Name: splate
Column.Description: 0 or specObj.plate Link to plate on which the spectrum was taken

Column.Name: sPrimTarget
Column.Description: 0 or specObj.PrimTarget Bit mask of primary target categories the object was selected in.

Column.Name: bType
Column.Description: 0 or best PhotoObj.type Morphological type classification of the object.

Column.Name: tType
Column.Description: 0 or target PhotoObj.type Morphological type classification of the object.

Column.Name: bFlags
Column.Description: 0 or best PhotoObj.Flags Object detection flags

Column.Name: tFlags
Column.Description: 0 or target PhotoObj.flags Object detection flags

Column.Name: bPrimTarget
Column.Description: 0 or best PhotoObj.PrimTarget Bit mask of primary target categories the object was selected in.

Column.Name: tPrimTarget
Column.Description: 0 or target PhotoObj.PrimTarget Bit mask of primary target categories the object was selected in.

Column.Name: bPsfMagErr_u
Column.Description: 0 or best PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_u PSF flux error

Column.Name: bPsfMagErr_g
Column.Description: 0 or best PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_g PSF flux error

Column.Name: bPsfMagErr_r
Column.Description: 0 or best PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_r PSF flux error

Column.Name: bPsfMagErr_i
Column.Description: 0 or best PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_i PSF flux error

Column.Name: bPsfMagErr_z
Column.Description: 0 or best PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_z PSF flux error

Column.Name: tPsfMagErr_u
Column.Description: 0 or target PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_u PSF flux error

Column.Name: tPsfMagErr_g
Column.Description: 0 or target PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_g PSF flux error

Column.Name: tPsfMagErr_r
Column.Description: 0 or target PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_r PSF flux error

Column.Name: tPsfMagErr_i
Column.Description: 0 or target PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_i PSF flux error

Column.Name: tPsfMagErr_z
Column.Description: 0 or target PhotoObj.PsfMagErr_z PSF flux error

Table.Name: ProfileDefs
Table.Description: This table contains the radii for the Profiles tabl

Column.Name: cell
Column.Description: the first cell in the annulus

Column.Name: aDisk
Column.Description: The area of the disk to outerRadius

Table.Name: TargetParam
Table.Description: Contains the parameters used for a version of the target selection cod

Table.Name: MaskedObject
Table.Description: Contains the objects inside a specific mas

Table.Name: Photoz
Table.Description: Contains the photometrically estimated redshifts for objects in the the Galaxies vie

Column.Name: rank
Column.Description: the rank of the photoz determination for this object, default is 0

Column.Name: class
Column.Description: char describing the object type (galaxy:1, QSO:tbd, ...)

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: unique ID pointing to PhotoObjAll table

Column.Name: chiSq
Column.Description: the chi-square value for the fit

Column.Name: zErr
Column.Description: the marginalized error of the photometric redshift

Column.Name: tErr
Column.Description: the marginalized error of the photometric type

Column.Name: fitRadius
Column.Description: radius of area used for covariance fit

Column.Name: fitThreshold
Column.Description: probability threshold for covariance fitting, peak normalized to 1

Column.Name: dmod
Column.Description: the distance modulus for Omega=0.3, Lambda=0.7 cosmology

Table.Name: QsoCatalogAll
Table.Description: A concordance of all the objects from Spectro, Best, or Target that 'smell' like a QS

Column.Name: bestObjID
Column.Description: Unique SDSS identifier in Best DB composed from [rerun,run,camcol,field,obj], or 0 if there is none.

Column.Name: targetObjID
Column.Description: Unique SDSS identifier in Target DB composed from [rerun,run,camcol,field,obj], or 0 if there is none.

Column.Name: zone
Column.Description: 1 arcminute zone used for spatial joins floor((dec+90)*60*60)

Column.Name: Confidence
Column.Description: a number between 0..1. If this has a SpecObj, then it is the QSO Zconf (see table definition). If no specobj, it is .3*(BestObjFlagedQso+TargetObjFlagedQso)

Column.Name: SpecObjQso
Column.Description: Flag (0 / 1): 1 means this SpecObj is SpecClass QSO or HiX_QSO

Column.Name: BestObjQso
Column.Description: Flag (0 / 1): 1 PhotoObjID was flagged as a QSO in the target flags.

Column.Name: TargetObjQso
Column.Description: Flag (0 / 1): 1 PhotoObjID was flagged as a QSO in the target flags.

Table.Name: Match
Table.Description: PhotoObj pairs from different runs (times) that probably are the same object

Table.Name: SiteConstants
Table.Description: Table holding site specific constant

Table.Name: USNO
Table.Description: SDSS objects that match to USNO objects have their match parameters stored here

Column.Name: delta
Column.Description: Position difference between catalog and photo object (r' band)

Column.Name: match
Column.Description: 1: successful match to catalog within 1.5 arcsec

Column.Name: angle
Column.Description: Direction of proper motion (+N through E)

Column.Name: blue
Column.Description: Blue magnitude of matching USNO object

Column.Name: red
Column.Description: Red magnitude of matching USNO object

Table.Name: TileAll
Table.Description: Contains information about an individual tile on the sky

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x projection of vector on unit sphere

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y projection of vector on unit sphere

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z projection of vector on unit sphere

Column.Name: nTargets
Column.Description: number of targets assigned to this tile

Column.Name: programName
Column.Description: character string of program (from plate inventory db)

Table.Name: QueryResults
Table.Description: Store the results of performance tests her

Table.Name: Region
Table.Description: Definition of the different region

Column.Name: id
Column.Description: key of the region pointing into other tables

Column.Name: sql
Column.Description: the precompiled SQL predicate of region

Column.Name: xml
Column.Description: the precompiled XML description of region

Table.Name: Rosat
Table.Description: SDSS objects that match to ROSAT objects have their match parameters stored here

Column.Name: delta
Column.Description: Position difference between catalog and photo object (r' band)

Column.Name: match
Column.Description: ID of the matching ROSAT source (0 = no match)

Table.Name: FileGroupMap
Table.Description: For 'big' databases, maps big tables to their own file group

Table.Name: ELRedShift
Table.Description: Contains data for the Emission Line Redshift

Table.Name: SpecLineIndex
Table.Description: Precomputed spectral line indices

Column.Name: specLineIndexID
Column.Description: Unique id number for the lineindex

Table.Name: Rmatrix
Table.Description: Contains various rotation matrices between spherical coordinate system

Table.Name: XCRedshift
Table.Description: Table of Cross-Correlation Redshift

Table.Name: Diagnostics
Table.Description: This table stores a full diagnostic snapshot of the database

Column.Name: type
Column.Description: System type of the object (U:table, V:view, F: function, P: stored proc)

Table.Name: LoadHistory
Table.Description: Tracks the loading history of the databas

Table.Name: TilingGeometry
Table.Description: Geometric information about TilingRegion

Column.Name: tilingGeometryID
Column.Description: hash of tileRun and sequential id assigned by csv creator

Column.Name: nsbx
Column.Description: b: official stripe boundaries should be included, x: use the full rectangle

Column.Name: coordType
Column.Description: specifies coordinate system for the boundaries

Column.Name: targetVersion
Column.Description: version of target software within this boundary

Column.Name: firstArea
Column.Description: area of sky covered by this boundary that was not covered by previous boundaries

Table.Name: PhotoProfile
Table.Description: The light profiles of SDSS photo object

Column.Name: profErr
Column.Description: Standard deviation of mean pixel flux in annulus

Table.Name: DBColumns
Table.Description: Every column of every table has a description in this tabl

Column.Name: tablename
Column.Description: The name of the parent table

Column.Name: enum
Column.Description: Optional link to an enumerated table

Table.Name: MatchHead
Table.Description: Canonical object from each match cluster, and cluster statistic

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: The unique objId of the center object

Column.Name: varRa
Column.Description: cluster's variance in J2000 right ascension (r')

Column.Name: missCount
Column.Description: count of runs missing from cluster

Table.Name: History
Table.Description: Tracks the history of changes to the databas

Column.Name: text
Column.Description: Details of changes in HTML form

Table.Name: Field
Table.Description: Contains all the measured parameters of a photometric fiel

Column.Name: csRow_u
Column.Description: Slope in row DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: csRow_g
Column.Description: Slope in row DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: csRow_r
Column.Description: Slope in row DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: csRow_i
Column.Description: Slope in row DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: csRow_z
Column.Description: Slope in row DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: csCol_u
Column.Description: Slope in column DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: csCol_g
Column.Description: Slope in column DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: csCol_r
Column.Description: Slope in column DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: csCol_i
Column.Description: Slope in column DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: csCol_z
Column.Description: Slope in column DCR correction for blue objects

Column.Name: ccRow_u
Column.Description: Constant row DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: ccRow_g
Column.Description: Constant row DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: ccRow_r
Column.Description: Constant row DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: ccRow_i
Column.Description: Constant row DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: ccRow_z
Column.Description: Constant row DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: ccCol_u
Column.Description: Constant column DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: ccCol_g
Column.Description: Constant column DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: ccCol_r
Column.Description: Constant column DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: ccCol_i
Column.Description: Constant column DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: ccCol_z
Column.Description: Constant column DCR correction for red objects

Column.Name: riCut_u
Column.Description: r'-i' cutoff between blue and red objects

Column.Name: riCut_g
Column.Description: r'-i' cutoff between blue and red objects

Column.Name: riCut_r
Column.Description: r'-i' cutoff between blue and red objects

Column.Name: riCut_i
Column.Description: r'-i' cutoff between blue and red objects

Column.Name: riCut_z
Column.Description: r'-i' cutoff between blue and red objects

Column.Name: airmass_u
Column.Description: Airmass for star at frame center (mid exposure)

Column.Name: airmass_g
Column.Description: Airmass for star at frame center (mid exposure)

Column.Name: airmass_r
Column.Description: Airmass for star at frame center (mid exposure)

Column.Name: airmass_i
Column.Description: Airmass for star at frame center (mid exposure)

Column.Name: airmass_z
Column.Description: Airmass for star at frame center (mid exposure)

Column.Name: raMin
Column.Description: Minima of this field in ra/dec

Column.Name: raMax
Column.Description: Maxima of this field in ra/dec

Column.Name: decMin
Column.Description: Minima of this field in ra/dec

Column.Name: decMax
Column.Description: Maxima/maxima of this field in ra/dec

Column.Name: scanlineArea
Column.Description: Area of scanline covered by the field

Column.Name: stripeArea
Column.Description: Area of stripe covered by the field

Column.Name: rowOffset_u
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed row coordinates

Column.Name: rowOffset_g
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed row coordinates

Column.Name: rowOffset_r
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed row coordinates

Column.Name: rowOffset_i
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed row coordinates

Column.Name: rowOffset_z
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed row coordinates

Column.Name: colOffset_u
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed column coordinates

Column.Name: colOffset_g
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed column coordinates

Column.Name: colOffset_r
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed column coordinates

Column.Name: colOffset_i
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed column coordinates

Column.Name: colOffset_z
Column.Description: Offset to add to transformed column coordinates

Column.Name: nEffPsf_u
Column.Description: Effective area of the point spread function.

Column.Name: nEffPsf_g
Column.Description: Effective area of the point spread function.

Column.Name: nEffPsf_r
Column.Description: Effective area of the point spread function.

Column.Name: nEffPsf_i
Column.Description: Effective area of the point spread function.

Column.Name: nEffPsf_z
Column.Description: Effective area of the point spread function.

Column.Name: skyPsp_u

Column.Description: Sky from the point spread function.

Column.Name: skyPsp_r
Column.Description: Sky from the point spread function.

Column.Name: skyPsp_i
Column.Description: Sky from the point spread function.

Column.Name: skyPsp_z
Column.Description: Sky from the point spread function.

Column.Name: skyFrames_u
Column.Description: Global sky value in the corrected frame.

Column.Name: skyFrames_g
Column.Description: Global sky value in the corrected frame.

Column.Name: skyFrames_r
Column.Description: Global sky value in the corrected frame.

Column.Name: skyFrames_i
Column.Description: Global sky value in the corrected frame.

Column.Name: skyFrames_z
Column.Description: Global sky value in the corrected frame.

Column.Description: Global sky value after object subtraction.

Column.Description: Global sky value after object subtraction.

Column.Description: Global sky value after object subtraction.

Column.Description: Clipped sigma of pixel values in corrected frame

Column.Description: Clipped sigma of pixel values in corrected frame

Column.Name: u_z

Column.Name: pspStatus
Column.Description: Maximum value of 'status' over all 5 filters

Column.Name: obj
Column.Description: The object id within a field. Usually changes between reruns of the same field.

Column.Name: nChild
Column.Description: Number of children if this is a composite object that has been deblended. BRIGHT (in a flags sense) objects also have nchild == 1, the non-BRIGHT sibling.

Column.Name: type
Column.Description: Morphological type classification of the object.

Column.Name: probPSF
Column.Description: Probability that the object is a star. Currently 0 if type == 3 (galaxy), 1 if type == 6 (star).

Column.Name: insideMask
Column.Description: Flag to indicate whether object is inside a mask and why

Table.Name: Frame
Table.Description: Contains JPEG images of fields at various zoom factors, and their astrometry

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: The htmID for point at frame center

Table.Name: Zone
Table.Description: Table to organize objects into declination zone

Column.Name: mode
Column.Description: mode is primary, secondary, family, outside

Column.Name: native
Column.Description: true if obj is local, false if from the destination dataset

Table.Name: PartitionMap
Table.Description: Shows the names of partitions/filegroups and their relative size

Table.Name: DBObjects
Table.Description: Every SkyServer database object has a one line description in this tabl

Table.Name: Sector
Table.Description: Stores the information about set of unique tile overlaps

Column.Name: regionID
Column.Description: unique ID, points to Region table

Table.Name: DBObjectDescription
Table.Description: Contains the long description of each DBObject in HTML forma

Table.Name: Glossary
Table.Description: Contains a paragraph of text for each keyword in the Glossar

Table.Name: TilingRun
Table.Description: Contains basic information for a run of tilin

Column.Name: programName
Column.Description: character string of program (from plate inventory db)

Column.Name: primTargetMask
Column.Description: bit mask for target types to be tiled

Column.Name: secTargetMask
Column.Description: bit mask for target types to be tiled

Table.Name: Chunk
Table.Description: Contains basic data for a Chun

Table.Name: Segment
Table.Description: Contains the basic parameters associated with a Segmen

Column.Name: nFields
Column.Description: Number of fields in this segment

Column.Name: strip
Column.Description: Strip (N or S) (? which is which)

Column.Name: targetAstroVersion
Column.Description: Astrometric Pipeline version used for target selection

Column.Name: exportAstroVersion
Column.Description: Astrometric pipeline version used for export to Science Archive

Column.Name: targetFCalibId
Column.Description: Photometric calibration used for target selection

Column.Name: targetFCalibVersion
Column.Description: FCALIB pipeline version used for target selection

Column.Name: exportFCalibID
Column.Description: Photometric calibration used for export to Science Archive

Column.Name: exportFCalibVersion
Column.Description: FCALIB pipeline version used for export to Science Archive

Column.Name: loaderVersion
Column.Description: Version of Science Archive Loader used to load this segment

Table.Name: First
Table.Description: SDSS objects that match to FIRST objects have their match parameters stored her

Column.Name: delta
Column.Description: Position difference between catalog and photo object (r' band)

Column.Name: match
Column.Description: Number of matches to catalog within 1.5 arcsec

Column.Name: id
Column.Description: FIRST catalog id of one matching source

Table.Name: PlateX
Table.Description: Contains data from a given plate used for spectroscopic observations

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x of Normal unit vector in J2000

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y of Normal unit vector in J2000

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z of Normal unit vector in J2000

Column.Name: isPrimary
Column.Description: is this PlateX a primary observation of the plate

Column.Name: cartridgeID
Column.Description: ID of cartridge used for the observation

Column.Name: programName
Column.Description: character string of program (from plate inventory db)

Table.Name: PubHistory
Table.Description: This table keeps the record of publishing into a tabl

Column.Name: name
Column.Description: the name of the table we publish into

Column.Name: tend
Column.Description: the time the table was published

Column.Name: loadversion
Column.Description: the taskid where it came from

Table.Name: FieldProfile
Table.Description: The mean PSF profile for the field as determined from bright stars

Table.Name: Best2Sector
Table.Description: Match best PhotoObjs to sectors

Table.Name: DBViewCols
Table.Description: The columns of each view are stored for the auto-documentatio

Table.Name: Mask
Table.Description: Contains a record describing the each mask objec

Column.Name: maskID
Column.Description: Unique Id number, composed of skyversion, rerun, run, camcol, field, filter, mask

Column.Name: mask
Column.Description: The object id within a field. Usually changes between reruns of the same field.

Column.Name: radius
Column.Description: the radius of the bounding circle

Column.Name: area
Column.Description: Area descriptor for the mask object

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: 20-deep hierarchical trangular mesh ID of this object

Table.Name: Target
Table.Description: Keeps track of objects chosen by target selection and need to be tiled

Column.Name: targetID
Column.Description: hash of run, rerun, camcol, field, object (skyVersion=0)

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x projection of vector on unit sphere

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y projection of vector on unit sphere

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z projection of vector on unit sphere

Column.Name: bestObjID
Column.Description: hashed ID of object in best version of the sky

Column.Name: specObjID
Column.Description: hashed ID of specobj in best version of the sky

Table.Name: IndexMap
Table.Description: Table containing the definition of all indice

Column.Name: indexmapid
Column.Description: unique primary key for the indexmap

Column.Name: code
Column.Description: one char designator of index category for lookup ('K'|'F'|'I')

Column.Name: type
Column.Description: index type, one of ('primary key'|'foreign key'|'index'|'unique index')

Column.Name: tableName
Column.Description: the name of the table the index is built on

Column.Name: fieldList
Column.Description: the list of columns to be included in the index

Column.Name: foreignKey
Column.Description: the definition of the foreign Key if any

Table.Name: TiledTargetAll
Table.Description: Keep track of why a Target was assigned to a Til

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: x projection of vector on unit sphere

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: y projection of vector on unit sphere

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: z projection of vector on unit sphere

Column.Name: targetID

Column.Name: programName
